content: the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology ✩ skill level easy crochet pattern but you should know how to crochet with fluffy yarn abbreviations chain - chain st - stitch single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease blo - back loops only ✩ the size of the toy is approx 9 inches tall if made with indicated materials the size may vary if you choose another weight of yarn and crochet hook number materials ↠ fluffy yarn you can use any kind of fluffy yarn but it must be according with crochet hook 2 5 mm for example yarn art mink crochet in 1 thread rico design baby teddy aran crochet in 2 thread scheepjes softy crochet in 2 thread alize softy crochet in 2 thread ↠ yarn for leg and face it must be according with crochet hook 2 5 mm for example rico design creative cotton dk yarn and colors must-have scheepjes catona gazzal organic baby cotton ↠ yarn for a scarf it must be according with crochet hook 2 5 mm for example bbb new master mondial biolanafine ↠ crochet hook 2 5 mm ↠ safety eyes 10 mm ↠ stuffing ↠ stitch markers scissors needle
